description:
An executive luxury lifestyle awaits you in this riverfront apartment within Hamilton's boutique 'Gallery House'. Perched on the water's edge with breathtaking vistas across the river, city and mountains, residents will experience sensational views and resort-style living.

Architecturally designed, the apartment takes full advantage of the waterfront position to maximise the sunlight and breezes.

The lounge and dining area reveals herringbone floors, floor-to-ceiling glass and effortless integration with the study nook and Miele kitchen. Exquisite entertaining can be enjoyed on the balcony, delighting in scenic vistas from sunrise to sunset across the Brisbane River, city skyline, mountains and Bulimba landscape.

Entertaining can continue on Gallery House's two rooftop sky decks and yoga lawn. Both rooftops boast BBQ facilities, and one features a mesmerising infinity pool soaking in unrivalled Brisbane panoramas.

The functional layout comprises two bedrooms with balcony access, two bathrooms, two secure car spaces and an oversized basement storage area. The master suite captures river views and reveals a walk-in robe and ensuite featuring dual vanities and a rainfall shower.

Property features include:
- Lounge, dining area and study nook with herringbone floors
- Miele kitchen appliances, stone bench-tops and timber breakfast bar
- Master suite with a walk-in robe and dual vanity ensuite
- The second bedroom features a built-in robe
- Second bathroom and a separate internal laundry
- Ducted air-conditioning, intercom system and lift access
- Two secure car spaces and visitor parking
- A massive 9sqm basement storage area
- Two rooftop sky decks, yoga lawn and infinity pool

Located in Hamilton's exclusive Portside Wharf precinct, residents will experience the ultimate riverfront lifestyle. Famed cafes, restaurants, specialty stores and Dendy Cinema are at your doorstep. The beautiful riverwalk is right outside, featuring paths to bus stops, CityCat, Eat Street Markets, Northshore and parkland. Providing lifestyle convenience, you are 10 minutes from the airport and 15 minutes to the CBD.

For more information, please contact Caleb Mayberry on 0414 715 101. I look forward to meeting you.

Disclaimer: Whilst every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these particulars, no warranty is given by the vendor or the agent as to their accuracy. Interested parties should not rely on these particulars as representations of fact but must instead satisfy themselves by inspection or otherwise.

The website possibly filtered this property into a price range for functionality purposes. Any estimates are not provided by the agent and should not be taken as a price guide.
